org.gradoop.flink.io.api.metadata

Interface MetaDataSource<M extends MetaData>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - meta data type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSVMetaDataSource

    public interface MetaDataSource<M extends MetaData>
    Base interface for factories that create metadata objects from tuples and files (distributed or locally).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EDGE_TYPE
      Used to tag an edge entity.
      static String GRAPH_TYPE
      Used to tag a graph head entity.
      static String VERTEX_TYPE
      Used to tag a vertex entity.

      • fromTuples

        M fromTuples(List<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple3<String,String,String>> metaDataStrings)
        Creates a MetaData object from the specified lines. The specified tuple is already separated into the label and the metadata.
        Parameters:
        metaDataStrings - (element prefix (g,v,e), label, meta data) tuples
        Returns:
        Meta Data object

      • readDistributed

        org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple3<String,String,String>> readDistributed(String path,
                                                                                                                GradoopFlinkConfig config)
        Reads the meta data from a specified file. Each line is split into a (element prefix, label, metadata) tuple and put into a dataset. The latter can be used to broadcast the metadata to the mappers.
        Parameters:
        path - path to metadata csv file
        config - gradoop configuration
        Returns:
        (element prefix ( g, v, e), label, metadata) tuple dataset

      • readLocal

        M readLocal(String path,
            org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration hdfsConfig)
     throws IOException
        Reads the meta data from a specified csv file. The file can be either located in a local file system or in HDFS.
        Parameters:
        path - path to metadata csv file
        hdfsConfig - file system configuration
        Returns:
        meta data
        Throws:
        IOException
